name: Alien Afteflife
description:
Aliens terrorists have stolen the machine to reincarnate you. Go get it back.

Please report all bugs/comments/etc to jeremycouillard@gmail.com or post in the comments.

New in version 0.6 - working on strange collision problem that happens on some machines at the beginning of the Dorveille Village level. Also fixed some smaller sound issues and a trigger problem on the 1st level.

Still to do - tidy up any glitches. Add vibration for gamepad.

Please report any problems.

http://www.alienafterlife.com

Alien Afterlife is an 3d adventure game for the PC.

You die and float off into the after life. But aliens suddenly invade and steal the mechanism needed to reincarnate. Explore different levels of the bardo while you gather back the pieces needed for your rebirth.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

This game will be released in February of 2017 as part of an art show through Yours Mine and Ours Gallery in New York.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

/*Features*/

-Takes around an hour to finish the main game

-4 levels and new challenges when the main objective is completed

-Game pad support

-Original music, narration and assets

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

/*Minimum requirements*/

I'm still figuring this one out. I think around an Nvidia GTX 550, 8 gigs of ram and a at least a quad core processor.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
